item.description:
Movie night POSTPONED.  To be RESCHEDULED..........

 

Please let me know which movie you'd prefer to see - early shows (6:15) are War Horse and New Year's Eve.  Later (8:15) shows are Twilight, and Young Adult. 

You can't beat this for a movie night out: only $6 per person, and the meals are really affordable, with good portions! We sit together at a table and eat during the movie. 

Route One Cinema Pub is located at 652 E. Washington St. (Rte. 1) in North Attleboro. Take 495 north or south to Exit 14B, Rte. 1 South. Follow 3.7 miles and the Route One Cinema Pub will be on your right hand side in the Quan's Kitchen and Sherwin Williams Shopping Plaza or take 295 north or south to Exit 1B, Rte. 1 North. Follow 2.5 miles and the Route One Cinema Pub will be on your left-hand side in the Quan's Kitchen and Sherwin Williams Shopping Plaza.
item.name: Movie Night
